snippet: Eric Dompierre may be prohibited from playing his senior season because his athletics association bars anyone who is 19 as of Sept. 1 from participating in sports for that school year.
abstract: Profile of Eric Dompierre, high school junior from Ishpeming, Mich, who has Down syndrome; Dompierre may be prohibited from playing basketball his senior year because his athletic association bars anyone who is 19 as of Sept. 1 from participating in sports for that school year.
lead_paragraph: Eric Dompierre may be prohibited from playing his senior season because his athletics association bars anyone who is 19 as of Sept. 1 from participating in sports for that school year.

headline.seo: For High School Athlete With Down Syndrome, Age Is an Issue
headline.main: For High School Athlete With Down Syndrome, Age Is an Issue
headline.print_headline: Age Is Obstacle for Athlete With Down Syndrome
